senses.sense_definition: A person who has knowledge and skills in many different areas rather than specializing in just one.

examples.text: As a <w>generalist</w>, she can handle tasks ranging from marketing to basic accounting.
Small startups often prefer to hire a <w>generalist</w> who can adapt to various roles.

senses.sense_definition: A species capable of surviving in various environmental conditions and utilizing a wide range of resources.

examples.text: The raccoon is a successful <w>generalist</w> that thrives in both forests and cities.
Because it eats almost anything, this bird is considered an ecological <w>generalist</w>.

senses.sense_definition: A medical doctor who treats a wide range of illnesses and does not specialize in a single field; a general practitioner.

examples.text: The <w>generalist</w> examined the patient before referring them to a cardiologist.
In rural areas, a medical <w>generalist</w> is often the only doctor available for miles.
